code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Pagination(_ref){var totalPosts=_ref.totalPosts,postsperpage=_ref.postsperpage,paginate=_ref.paginate,currentpage=_ref.currentpage;var pages=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalPosts/postsperpage);i++){pages.push(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pagin",children:pages.map(function(page,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return paginate(page);},className:page==currentpage?"active":"",children:page},index);})});}export default Pagination;
